thread.title: Leslie Grace
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Leslie Grace

author: Leslie Grace
title: Leslie Grace
text: We will definitely come back to Gardner White, the service in the store and delivery was the best. The ability to track the deliver on-line was very helpful. I would recommend the store to anyone asking about furniture and/or mattress purchases.
